The Keyword Highlighter extension is a powerful tool designed to enhance your browsing experience by helping you quickly scan and identify key content on any webpage. Here's why you should install it:

Features and Benefits:

1. Highlight Keywords:
You can highlight up to three groups of keywords, each separated by a comma. This allows you to categorize and differentiate between various sets of keywords effortlessly.
Persistent Settings:

The extension remembers your keyword groups even after a page refresh, ensuring that you don't have to re-enter your keywords every time you visit a new page.

2. Customizable Appearance:
Choose your preferred highlight colors and font sizes for each keyword group. This customization helps you visually distinguish between different types of information at a glance.

3. Efficient Content Scanning:
By highlighting important keywords, the extension enables you to quickly scan through large amounts of text and identify the key points, saving you valuable time and effort.

4. Work and Educational Tool:
The extension is not only useful for professionals but also serves as a valuable educational aid. Whether you are learning new terminology in your field of study or mastering a foreign language such as English, highlighting target terms can significantly enhance your learning process.

5. Use Cases:
5.1 Research and Reading:
Easily identify and focus on specific terms while conducting research or reading articles, making it easier to gather relevant information.

5.2 Learning and Education:
Highlight key terms for quick revision or language learning. It's a great tool for students and educators alike.

5.3 Productivity Enhancement:
Save time by quickly spotting the information you need on any webpage, improving your overall productivity.

The Keyword Highlighter extension is an essential tool for anyone looking to optimize their web browsing experience, streamline their research process, or enhance their learning. Install it today and start benefiting from a more efficient and focused way of reading online content.
